鮤鮤鮤

鮤字的基本解释

鮤
liè
魛鱼。

鮤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liè］
［《廣韻》良薛切，入薛，來。］
［《廣韻》力制切，去祭，來。］
鱼名。又名鮆鱼、刀鱼、鱴刀鱼。

鮤字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮤； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1469第12
【廣韻】良薛切【集韻】力蘖切，?音列。刀魚也。一名鱴。今鮆魚也。【爾雅·釋魚】鮤，鱴刀。【疏】鮤名鱴刀。又【廣韻】【集韻】?力制切，音例。義同。

鮤字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鮤字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Glutton
liè
Rayfish.
Glutton
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liè］
["Guangyun" Liang Xue cut, enter Xue, come. ]
["Guangyun" force cutting, go to sacrifice, come. ]
The name of the fish. Also known as saury, saury, saury.
Glutton
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鮤; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1469 Page 12
[Guangyun] Liang Xueqie [Jiyun] Force tiller and cut,? Sound list. Saury too. One 鱴. Today, the fish is too. 【Erya·Shiyu】Taste, sword. 【Sparse】The name is a knife. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Force cutting, phonetic examples. The same meaning.

сущ.

2) койлия (мелководная морская рыба)
